page.title: 07BALNAGOWAN GOLLANFIELD.
page.content: Mains of Balnagowan is owned by { {Stackpole Farms LTD,}but is farmed by Mr S. Rochford. The farm itself is a mixed cattle farm. Mr Rochford looks after 200 Suckler cows and 600 breeding ewes. Because the cows calve in September & October, a 24 hour check is needed; same attention is used for the ewes. Quite drastic changes have occurred in 20 years. Most of the old farm buildings have been demolished; this occurred in 1978 and now there are new buildings. Another change is the amount of workers on the farm; in 1960 there were 50 workers, but because of the new machinery,there are only 3 workers now. The total acreage over 30 fields is 480. Also, the land is Light sandy Loam .Crops-Barley,oats,peas,grass.
